price: 25 Ils n’y entendront ni paroles indignes, ni même futilités.
arabic: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan walā tathīman
